title: OpenAI Announces GPT-5 with 1 Trillion Parameters
excerpt: OpenAI unveils GPT‑5, scaling up to 1 trillion parameters, achieving state‑of‑the‑art performance across diverse NLP benchmarks while introducing efficient training techniques.

title: Meta Introduces ViCo, Vision-Chat Model for Visual Reasoning
excerpt: Meta's ViCo integrates vision and language modalities, enabling fluent visual reasoning and interactive dialogue, surpassing prior models on VQA and image captioning tasks.

title: Boston Dynamics Deploys Atlas in Warehouse Automation
excerpt: Atlas robot now performs autonomous inventory management in a large warehouse, demonstrating advanced perception, motion planning, and human‑robot interaction capabilities.

title: DeepMind Achieves Human‑Level Control in StarCraft II
excerpt: A new RL algorithm combines self‑play, hierarchical policies, and sparse reward shaping to beat professional StarCraft II players, marking a milestone in complex strategy games.

title: ArXiv Preprint: Transformer‑based Protein Structure Prediction
excerpt: A novel transformer architecture predicts protein folding with 95% accuracy on CASP14, surpassing AlphaFold 2 on several benchmarks.

title: OpenAI Releases Public LLM Benchmark LLMBench 2025
excerpt: LLMBench 2025 provides a comprehensive suite of tasks evaluating reasoning, safety, and efficiency across 50 open‑source models, fostering reproducible research.

title: NVIDIA Announces GPU‑Accelerated LLM Training Platform
excerpt: The new platform enables training 500‑billion‑parameter LLMs in under 48 hours, reducing energy consumption by 60% through mixed‑precision and sparsity optimizations.
